title: vaNangiDuvOm vArum
sahitya:
vaNangiDuvOm vArum vaDivElanai nAm


anupallavi

  vaNangAda sUranai vIra vEl kUriTTadum vaNangina avanait-tan vAhanam AkkiTTOnai


caraNam    sharaNam enru evar uraittAlum avarai aravaNaitt-AtkoLLum aruT-jyOti vaLlalai
harahara muruganE Arumukhap-perumAnE sharavaNabhavanE shrI guruparanE enap-pOTri
